briefTitle: Optimizing Surgical Decisions in Young Adults With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Optimizing Surgical Decisions in Young Adults With Breast Cancer
conditions: Breast Cancer Stage 0, Breast Cancer Stage I, Breast Cancer Stage II, Breast Cancer Stage III
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Pre-surgical decisional conflict as measured by the Decisional Conflict Scale (DCS)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female aged 18-44
* New diagnosis of Stage 0, 1, 2, or 3 unilateral breast cancer
* English or Spanish speaking

Exclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosis of de novo Stage 4 breast cancer
* Recurrent early-stage breast cancer
* Bilateral breast cancer
